Description:
The assistant of the military officer in charge of this camp informs you that his commander, a surgeon, is about to operate on himself for an injury sustained in the last battle, as there is no one else in the camp capable of performing such a surgery. 

He mentions that the surgeon commander is the only one who can authorize you to take materials and equipment from the camp’s arsenal. 

Additionally, he notes that if anyone among you has medical knowledge, your help would be greatly appreciated.
DescriptionAction: Will you assist the surgeon on his operation?
